item.title: Time Categories
item.description: Abstract This concept states that we should look at time in terms of its category in addition to its blocks (Deep Work Blocks) and roles (Roles). Simply, time can be seen as categories, the two main ones are Doing and Thinking. Thinking involves activities such as study, research and reading (Reading queue).
